title: ANTAM Conferred 10 Awards in Mineral and Coal Mining Safety and Environmental Management Awards 2015 ...
text: ( Source : PT Aneka Tambang (Persero) Tbk) Jakarta , September 30 , 2015 - PT ANTAM (Persero) Tbk (ANTAM; ASX - ATM ; IDX - ANTM ) was conferred 10 awards by the Directorate General of Coal and Minerals of the Ministry of Energy and Mineral
